entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 11:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -8.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:05 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:05 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:05 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
